Dropdowns.Title: MSAA Level
Dropdowns.Description: Adjust the level of antialiasing to improve visual quality and reduce jagged edges.

Dropdowns.Title: Graphics Renderer
Dropdowns.Description: Select the graphics renderer to determine how the game renders visual elements.

Dropdowns.Title: Video Recorder File Format
Dropdowns.Description: Select the file format to use when recording videos with the Roblox recorder.

Dropdowns.Title: Logo Version
Dropdowns.Description: Replaces the current logo with the currently selected version.

Dropdowns.Title: Splash Screen Version
Dropdowns.Description: Modifies the original splash screen to match the selected version.

Toggles.Title: Studio Menu Redesign
Toggles.Description: Enable the new Studio menu design for a compact, linux-like look.

Toggles.Title: Enable Next-Gen Studio Interface
Toggles.Description: Enable the new next-gen Studio interface introduced in July 2024.

InternetRequired.Title: Force High Graphics
InternetRequired.Description: Enable high-quality graphics, improving visual fidelity but potentially lowering performance.

InternetRequired.Title: Occulusion Culling
InternetRequired.Description: Enable occlusion culling to optimize performance by not rendering objects that are blocked by others.

InternetRequired.Title: Enable Legacy Explorer
InternetRequired.Description: Replaces the new Luau-based explorer with the native Qt version.

InternetRequired.Title: Enable Beta Features
InternetRequired.Description: Unlocks and activates all experimental and beta features within Roblox Studio.

InternetRequired.Title: Rename Friends to Connections
InternetRequired.Description: Replaces all instances of the term 'Friends' with 'Connections' throughout Roblox Studio.

InternetRequired.Title: Enable Proxy
InternetRequired.Description: Activates proxy settings to manage network traffic through an intermediary server.

InternetRequired.Title: Disable Crash Handler
InternetRequired.Description: Disable the crash handler to prevent automatic reporting of application crashes.

InternetRequired.Title: Log Network Requests
InternetRequired.Description: Log all network requests made by the application for debugging and analysis purposes.

InternetRequired.Title: Telemetry [UNSTABLE]
InternetRequired.Description: Enable the collection of telemetry data in Roblox Studio. If your Studio is crashing, please enable this feature.

InternetRequired.Title: Show Flags
InternetRequired.Description: Display a list of all enabled flags for debugging and configuration monitoring.

InternetRequired.Title: Legacy Cursor
InternetRequired.Description: Brings back the cursor style from 2021.

InternetRequired.Title: Classic Font
InternetRequired.Description: Replaces Arimo and Montserrat with their older counterparts.

InternetRequired.Title: Classic Death Sound
InternetRequired.Description: Revert to the original sound effect played upon character death.

InternetRequired.Title: Faster Menu
InternetRequired.Description: Increase the speed of menu animations for a quicker, snappier experience.

InternetRequired.Title: Enable Internal
InternetRequired.Description: Activate internal features of the platform, intended for testing or advanced users.

InternetRequired.Title: Disable Updates
InternetRequired.Description: Turn off automatic updates to prevent the application from downloading or installing new versions.

Type.Title: Max FPS
Type.Description: Set a limit on the maximum frames per second to control performance and reduce hardware load.

Type.Title: Font Size
Type.Description: Adjust the size of the text used in the interface for improved readability or compactness.

Type.Title: CoreGUI Transparency
Type.Description: Control the transparency level of the CoreGUI, making the interface more or less transparent.

Type.Title: Scroll Delta
Type.Description: Modify the sensitivity of mouse scrolling, adjusting how much content moves per scroll event.
